We define the set of all notes that differ by an octave:<math display="block">\mathbb{E}_n \stackrel{\mathtt{D}}{ = } \left\{ y \in \mathbb{G} :  I\left(n,y\right) ~\%~ 12 = 0  \right\}</math>
